name: Total Ratastrophe
description:
Total Ratastrophe is the game about cat, whos mission is to clear the dungeons from rats and other ugly creatures.

In the future the game will be available for mobiles. Mainly for android but hopefully for android and iOS.

Currently the game is in development. You can check the devlog series about this game on youtube!

Recent DevLog Controls

Current list of game's content is poor, so the controls are also not hard)

WSAD or ^v<> - movement
Space - teleport player into start room
Esc - restart level \ generate new dungeon
